pt.ptcris.test

Class Tester

  • java.lang.Object
    • pt.ptcris.test.Tester
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProgressHandler

    public class Tester
extends java.lang.Object
implements ProgressHandler
    A simple implementation of the progress handler to log the execution of PTCRISync procedures.

        public void setProgress(int progress)
        Used to set the progress of a task, by using percentual values (between 0 and 100). It can be used to start a task, where progress = 0
